entry.def: A hopper is a large cone-shaped device into which substances such as grain, coal, or animal food can be put and from which they can be released when required.

means.word_mean: 1. funnel-shaped receptacle; contents pass by gravity into a receptacle below

sentences.sentence: "at hopscotch, the best hoppers are the children"

means.word_mean: 3. a machine used for picking hops
4. terrestrial plant-eating insect with hind legs adapted for leaping
5. (baseball) a hit that travels along the ground
